location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Geological sketch map of part of Oman from Muscat to Ras al-Hadd

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Sketch map issued by the Intelligence Branch Topographical Division in July 1901 and attached to a ‘Report on coal, occurring in South Oman’ (folios 16-19v). Shows distribution of the coal in the eastern part of Oman from Muscat to Ras al-Hadd with areas coloured for reference and explained in a key provided in lower left.
